faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our service

questions.question: How does booking work?
questions.answer: Send your name and phone through our booking form. We'll call you to confirm details and availability. You pay on pickup - no prepayment required.

questions.question: Do I need to prepay?
questions.answer: No prepayment needed. Payment is made when you pick up your gear or on delivery. We accept cash or bank transfer.

questions.question: Is there a deposit?
questions.answer: Sometimes for higher-value items, we may require a small deposit. We'll inform you of any deposit requirements during the confirmation call.

questions.question: What do I need for student discount?
questions.answer: A valid student ID from any recognized educational institution. The discount is 15% off on all rental prices.

questions.question: How long can I rent?
questions.answer: From 1 day to 30 days for standard rentals. Longer periods are available upon request - just ask us during the confirmation call.

questions.question: Are rentals cleaned?
questions.answer: Yes, every device is professionally sanitized after each use. We include disposable hygiene covers where applicable for extra cleanliness.

questions.question: What if I'm late returning?
questions.answer: Extra days are charged at the standard daily rate. If you need to extend your rental period, just let us know and we'll arrange it.

questions.question: Do you deliver?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer delivery within Yerevan for a small fee. You can also pick up from our location. We'll confirm available options during the phone call.

questions.question: Are refurbished items guaranteed?
questions.answer: Yes, all refurbished items come with a 30-day limited warranty against defects. Each item is thoroughly tested and cleaned before sale.

questions.question: Legal & ethical use?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our gear is designed for study, online classes, calls, and content creation. We do not support or condone exam cheating, surveillance, or any illegal use of our equipment.
